info.name: EPITECH - Flat Intranet
info.description:
A flat design for our intranet. What else to say ?

This theme is still a work in progress, features will be added over time. Feel free to reuse this theme or edit it, but don't forget the license.
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGELOG 1.4.4
  • Units : Fixed a padding bug on the first column of the table
  • Activity : Add styling for arrows (just hide them and switch to a scrollbar)
  • Global : Fixed some linter errors
1.4.3
  • Profile: Set the page as full-width as the sidebar has been removed
1.4.2
  • Home : Activities titles created a scrollbar when overflowing on Chrome, fixed
  • Module sidebar : Fixed multiple bugs with the data tree
  • Module sidebar : Fixed a bug with the filters checkboxes
  • Profile : The marks table is now full-width, so marks comments go below
1.4.1
  • Minor improvements on the module page
  • Some bugfixes
1.4.0
  • E-learning : Styled the e-learning home page
  • Home : Changed the color to match the theme
1.3.2-alpha4
  • Schedule : Added a new color for undefined activities
  • Schedule : Styled the month view and the list view
1.3.2-alpha3
  • Schedule : Added a different color for registered activities
1.3.2-alpha2
  • Schedule : minor improvements
  • Schedule : Fix for invisible parts
1.3.2-alpha1
  • Added another missing style on the schedule
1.3.1-alpha1
  • Added a missing style on the schedule
1.3-alpha1
  • You were all waiting for it, the schedule has been redesigned, but this is an alpha version.
  • Finished the notifications design on the home page
  • Improved the header content
  • Minor improvement on the authentication form
1.2
  • Say hello to the new authentication page!
1.1-alpha2
  • The user's graph is back, somehow. Hover the user informations to make it appear.
  • Fixed the bug where the breadcrumb couldn't take the full width of the content. Yey \o/
  • Fixed some wrong colors on the sidebar
  • What's next ? I don't know.
1.1-alpha1
  • Say hello to the new profile page \o/
  • Added some responsiveness to the profile page
  • Bugfix on the breadcrumb
  • Fixed a bug on the sidebar for webkit based browsers
  • Reworked the tables, you MIGHT find some weird things
  • Reworked the buttons, you MIGHT find some weird things
  • Reworked the content headers, you WILL find weird things
1.0.2 - Compatibility
  • Firefox for Windows : Minimize icon on home page sections was bugged
  • Chrome : Override of a background-color on the sidebar
1.0.1
  • Added a little bit of responsive
  • The footer is back
  • Fixed a bug where the menu padding was fucked up
1.0
  • Deleted everything and redesigned everything from scratch. Yes, I do what I want.
  • A huge thanks to B. who wasted my time. <3
  • The footer will come back
0.1.1b2
  • Login : Removed the background, cuz fuck it.
0.1b2
  • Login : Added a new background for login page
  • Login : Office365 authentication is back
0.1b1
  • Home : Reduced the width of the notifications
  • Home : Sections are now styled !
0.1a4
  • Home : Moved the notifications on the left
  • Home : 2 sections per row instead of 4
  • Sidebar is 50px bigger
  • Moving to a fixed layout
  • Changed some paddings/margins
0.1a3
  • Notifications are back !
  • Added back the search button on .filter.find form
0.1a2
  • box-sizing: padding-box has been deprecated -> fixed
0.1a1
  • First release
